responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: The install-wp-tests.sh script is vulnerable to CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
    analysis: |
      The `install-wp-tests.sh` script uses user-provided data in the construction of OS commands without proper neutralization.
      An attacker who controls the values of the `DB_NAME`, `DB_USER`, `DB_PASS`, or `DB_HOST` environment variables could execute arbitrary commands on the system.
    cwe: CWE-78
    function_names: []
    filenames:
      - tests/bin/install-wp-tests.sh
    classification: very promising
```
